structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Funding for nonprofit agency -- Matching funds.

text.section: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services may provide, to the extent funds are available under KRS 210.040 and under conditions and standards established by the cabinet, funds to any nonprofit agency recognized as operating in the field of mental health and whose objectives are to carry out the purposes of KRS 210.040.

The funds, if provided, may be matched on a fifty-fifty (50-50) basis by the nonprofit agency receiving such funds. The cabinet shall determine whether the match may be in money or in kind services or other match.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 302, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 247, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982.
